Name: Ultrawings FLAT
About the game: Ultrawings FLAT is the non-VR version of the popular flight game where you pilot multiple aircraft to complete a variety of missions across an island-themed world. This is the version of the game for those that either A) have weak stomachs or B) do not have VR. Key Features - Pilot 4 distinct aircraft using your preferred controls (gamepad, mouse and keyboard, HOTAS). - Soar around 4 unique, beautifully stylized islands! - Earn money to buy new airports and new aircraft! - Lots of gameplay variety! Pop balloons, snap photos, race, perform spot landings, fly through score rings, and more! Ultrawings is the ultimate hobbyist flight game! - The world feels alive! Soar by flocks of seagulls, buzz other planes, and even fly by boats and cars! - Full English voice-overs guide you through the game! - NEW! External chase cameras help spatial awareness while you are flying! The game supports the following HOTAS flight systems: Saitek X52 Saitek X56 Thrustmaster HOTAS Warthog Thrustmaster HOTASX Thrustmaster HOTAS4 Thrustmaster T16000M If your joystick or HOTAS is not listed then the game will more than likely not detect it. Please contact us at support@bitplanetgames.com for further assistance.
